title: spec: selector example incorrectly states automatic dereference
body:
by **plash@komiga.com**: 
The last line in the "Selectors" section (under "Expressions") reads:

p.M0  // ((*p).T0).M0

where it should instead read:

p.M0  // (*(*p).T0).M0

(with p.T0 being an anonymous field of type *T0).

I have attached a patch for the current revision.
Attachments: 1. go_spec.html.patch (219 bytes)
